definitions: a sport involving the performance of organized cheering, chanting, and dancing in support of a sports team at games

examples.text: she started cheerleading last year after a background in dance

shortDefinitions: sport involving performance of organized cheering, chanting, and dancing in support of a sports team at matches

definitions: the enthusiastic and vocal support of someone or something

examples.text: the president deserves credit for not indulging in mindless cheerleading

shortDefinitions: enthusiastic and vocal supporter of person or thing

definitions: relating to the performance of organized cheering, chanting, and dancing
shortDefinitions: relating to performance of organized cheering, chanting, and dancing
